Uses of Class
mklab.JGNN.nn.Model

Packages that use Model
Package
Description
mklab.JGNN.adhoc
Contains classes that simplify data loading, model building, and training.
mklab.JGNN.nn
Implements neural networks components that are combined to define GNNs or other types of machine learning models.
mklab.JGNN.nn.initializers
Implements initializers to be applied on Model parameters to stochastically induce some desired property at the first training epoch.

    Method
    Description

    Model.addInput(Variable input)
    Adds to the model's inputs the provided Variable.
    Model

    Adds to the model's output the output of the provided operation.
    abstract Model

    Applies the initializer to a given model's parameters.

    Apply the provided initializer on the model to set first values to its parameters.
    protected Model

    Toggles the training mode of the model.
    Model

    Trains the model by calling ModelTraining.train(Model).
    Model
    Model.train(ModelTraining trainer, Matrix features, Matrix labels, Slice trainingSamples, Slice validationSamples)
    Deprecated.
    Training data have been moved inside ModelTraining instances to allow a uniform interface for all training scheme automations.
